}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== The "DES-108 Ver.C2", "Made in China", and the '''D-Link''' logo :is silkscreened on the board.
Supports: * 802.1p QoS * 802.3az Energy-Efficient Ethernet
==See also== *[[D-Link DES-1008D]] - ''10/100M Fast Ethernet Switch'' :H/W [https://nag.ru/telecom-equipment/inside/6766/d-link-des-1008d.html Ver: D3] - [[Realtek]] RTL8308B + 2x RTL8204B :H/W [https://forum.nag.ru/index.php?/topic/7001-proshivki-eprom-dlya-svitchey/&do=findComment&comment=302464 Ver: H5] - D-Link DL1008D :[https://forum.nag.ru/index.php?/topic/7001-proshivki-eprom-dlya-svitchey/&page=18#comment-415067 DES-1008D/RV] - D-Link DL1008D
:http://openrrcp.org.ru/wiki/hardware *[[D-Link DES-1016D rev D1]] ([http://openrrcp.org.ru/wiki/dlink_des1016d_d1 D1]/D2/D4) 16x FE - [[Realtek]] RTL8316B + 2x RTL8208B *[[D-Link DES-1024D]] ([http://openrrcp.org.ru/wiki/dlink_des1024d_b1 B1]) 24x FE - [[Realtek]] RTL8326 + 3x RTL8208 *[[D-Link DES-1024D]] ([http://openrrcp.org.ru/wiki/dlink_des1024d_c1 C1]/C3/C4) 24x FE - [[Realtek]] RTL8324 + 3x RTL8208B *[[D-Link DES-1026G]] 24x FE + 2x GbE - [[Realtek]] RTL8326 + 3x RTL8208 *[[D-Link DSS-16+]] (G3) 16x FE - [[Realtek]] RTL8316B + 2x RTL8208B
